title: How to do the T-step | Dance Tutorial

json.text: Hello! my name is Jes√∫s. Today's move is
really easy and it looks so good. It is called the T-Step.
Start placing your heels together. This position looks like a T upside down
that's why this move is called T-step.
Lift up one foot and at the same time  lift the toe of the other foot and spin on your heel
To properly do this place your weight on the heel of the spinning foot
now shift your weight toward your toe and spin again while you step down the other foot.
So we have 1, and 2. Try it slowly, 1, 2, 1, 2
now to the other side could be tricky but it is the same move.
As you get confident try mixing the two parts into one.
Do it on the beat of the music and you got it.
That's how you do the T-step
It's a really basic move but it looks so good
If you have any question leave it in the comments and I'll try to help you.
That's all I got for you so keep dancing
